hero.title: EU Insolvency Assets & Auctions.
hero.subtitle: DealSpy monitors bankruptcy and auction platforms across Hungary, Austria, and Germany. Get notified when relevant deals appear – servers, machinery, vehicles, or real estate.

problem.title: Sound familiar?

tooMany.title: Too many platforms
tooMany.desc: 10+ different sites to check daily. Who has time for that?

language.title: Language barrier
language.desc: The best deals are in German. Who has time to translate?

timing.title: Missing out
timing.desc: By the time you notice, the auction has ended or someone else got it.

problem.solutionDesc: We monitor all relevant platforms in one place, automatically translate the listings, and notify you instantly. You just focus on buying.

step1.title: Configure
step1.desc: Choose your categories, countries, and keywords.

step2.title: Monitor
step2.desc: DealSpy scans platforms daily and finds relevant opportunities.

step3.title: Notify
step3.desc: Get instant alerts via push, email, or Telegram when new deals arrive.

translation.title: Multi-language translation
translation.desc: German listings automatically appear in English. No manual translation needed.

filtering.title: Smart filtering
filtering.desc: Filter by category, country, keywords. Get only what you're interested in. No spam.

notifications.title: Instant notifications
notifications.desc: Push notification, Telegram, or email – you decide how to be notified.

digest.title: Daily digest
digest.desc: Prefer not to get instant alerts? Get all new deals in a daily email summary.

deadline.title: Deadline alerts
deadline.desc: See when auctions or tenders expire. Never miss a good opportunity again.

savings.title: 30-70% savings
savings.desc: Assets from insolvency and auctions typically sell at a fraction of market price.

ai.title: AI for reliable matches
ai.desc: We use AI to collect and categorize listings accurately – even when portals change their pages. You get consistent, trustworthy results.

trial.a: After registration, you can use all features of your chosen plan for 3 days for free. We only ask for payment details at the end of the trial if you wish to continue.

payment.q: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a: Credit card payments (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) via Stripe's secure payment platform.

cancel.q: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancel.a: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your paid period.

data.q: Where does the data come from?
data.a: Exclusively from public, official sources: court announcements, liquidator portals, auction house websites.

frequency.q: How often is the data updated?

api.a: Yes, in the Enterprise plan. You can integrate the deal feed via REST API.
